body: Not all 2D shared arrays are affected. As far as I can tell, only those whose types rely on constexpr default constructors enabled by NVCC's -expt-relaxed-constexpr option.
body_html: Not all 2D shared arrays are affected. As far as I can tell, only those whose types rely on constexpr default constructors enabled by NVCC's -expt-relaxed-constexpr option.
body_text: Not all 2D shared arrays are affected. As far as I can tell, only those whose types rely on constexpr default constructors enabled by NVCC's -expt-relaxed-constexpr option.
